snippet.title: 2024 PC Gaming Show | Battle Aces
snippet.description:
Discover the action that awaits you in Battle Aces in this segment that aired during the 2024 PC Gaming Show. Hosts, @Tasteless_TV and @ArtosisTV, are joined by Uncapped Games Senior Game Director, David Kim, as they introduce some of the new mechanics of our next-gen RTS!

Battle Aces represents a paradigm shift for the RTS genre, a strategy game for everyone! 

Get in on the action early and visit https://www.playbattleaces.com to sign up for the Closed Beta!

Wishlist Battle Aces on Steam today: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2682180/

Join the discussion on Discord: https://discord.gg/BattleAces

Follow us on all our social channels:
Twitter/X: https://twitter.com/playbattleaces 
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@BattleAces 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playbattleaces 
Facebook: https://facebook.com/BattleAces/
